````{r}

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(lmerTest)
library(lme4)
library(lubridate)
library(psych)
library(reshape2)
```



```{r}

path <- "C:/Users/vwend/Downloads/ASD aggression/" 
folders <- list.files(path)

data_collection <- NULL

pdf("test.pdf", width = 8, height = 12)


for (folder in folders){
  
  folders_lv2 <- list.files(paste(path,folder,sep=""))
  
  for (folder_lv2 in folders_lv2){
      
    files <- list.files(paste(
      paste(path,
            folder,
            sep=""), 
      folder_lv2, 
      sep = "/"), 
      pattern = "_combined_matched.csv")
  
  for (file in files){
    
    data <- read.csv(paste(
      paste(
        paste(path,
              folder,
              sep=""), 
        folder_lv2, 
        sep = "/"), 
      file, sep ="/"))
        
      names(data)<- tolower(names(data))
      data$timestamp2 <-as.POSIXct(data$timestamp/1000, 
                                   origin="1970-01-01",
                                   tz = "UTC")
      data$timestamp3 <-as.POSIXct(data$timestamp2,
                                   format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%OS")
      data$time_gap <- difftime(lead(data$timestamp3, 1), 
                                  data$timestamp3, 
                                units ="secs")
      data$eda_scale <- data$eda/max(data$eda, na.rm = T)*3
      data$file <- rep(file, nrow(data))
      
      data_collection <-rbind(data_collection, data)
      


      data_long <- melt(data[c("acc_x"  ,
                               "acc_y" ,
                               "acc_z"  ,
                               "bvp"  ,
                               "eda"     ,
                               "agg"  ,
                               "ed"     ,
                               "sib"   ,
                               "timestamp3"  )],
                        id.vars = "timestamp3")

      
      print(
        ggplot(data = data_long)+
          geom_line(aes(x = timestamp3, y =  value, group = variable, color = variable)) +
          theme_classic() +
          facet_wrap(~variable, ncol = 1, scale = "free") +
          ggtitle(file)
      )
      
       print(
        ggplot(data = data)+
          geom_line(aes(x = timestamp3, y =  acc_x/100), color = "blue", alpha = .1) +
          geom_line(aes(x = timestamp3, y =  acc_y/100), color = "blue", alpha = .1) +
          geom_line(aes(x = timestamp3, y =  acc_z/100), color = "blue", alpha = .1) +
          
          geom_line(aes(x = timestamp3, y =  eda), color = "red", size = 2) +
          geom_line(aes(x = timestamp3, y =  agg), color = "pink", size = 2) +
          
          theme_classic() +
          # facet_wrap(~variable, ncol = 1, scale = "free") +
          ggtitle(file)
      )
  }
  }
}

dev.off()
